instructions: Launch the Netflix app and log in to your Netflix account. Tap the movie or show you want to download. Tap the Download icon (a down-arrow pointing to a horizontal line). For movies, it appears on the film's description page; for shows, it appears next to each individual episode. The download for that particular film or show begins. Track the download progress in the app and from the Android notifications menu. When the download finishes, access the movie or show from the Netflix app's Downloads tab.
